events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30th, detailing the circumstances and damage sustained.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and verifying the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in vehicle accident claims was assigned to handle the case promptly and ensure customer support throughout the process.
Formal acknowledgment of the claim sent to the customer with details on next steps and required documentation.
Request sent to the customer for submission of police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and insurance policy details.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and detailed images of the car’s damages sustained during the collision.
Investigation commenced to assess the cause of the collision and validate the extent of the vehicle damage noted in the claim.
Investigation findings finalized, confirming the claim’s legitimacy and assessing the estimated repair costs for the vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering damages and repair costs based on the investigation results and policy coverage.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal, expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling and offered compensation.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms and verification by the claims department.
Compensation payment for repairs was issued to the customer’s nominated bank account as per the approved settlement agreement.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the payment was received and the customer had no further inquiries.
All case documents and communications were securely archived in the insurance system for future reference.
